text:
www.popsugar.com / Wednesday, 18 July 2018 10:55:05

Jelly nails are the new trend on the block, and if you've already made your mind up about whether they're cute or not, wait until you see these recreations. We bet you'll be running to your nail tech ASAP. Kylie Jenner, leader of beauty trends, shared her and her friends' jelly nails on Instagram. Since then, the look has been recreated by nail artists everywhere.
title: How to Wear Basketball Shorts Like Joan Smalls and Kim Kardashian
